name: Classic Dutch Baby Pancake
directions: Blend eggs on medium-high until frothy, about 45 seconds.
Add flour, milk, nutmeg, sugar, salt, and vanilla; blend until smooth. Batter will be thin.
Let batter rest 15 minutes at room temperature (or refrigerate up to 24 hours).
Place butter in a 10-inch oven-safe skillet and heat in oven 5 minutes to melt.
Remove skillet, swirl butter to coat sides, then pour batter into the hot pan.
Bake 15 minutes at 400°F (204°C), then reduce to 350°F (177°C) and bake 10 minutes more, until golden and puffed.
Cool 5 minutes before topping, slicing, and serving.
